wikipedia_page.main: June Green (born 18 January 1959) is a female British former swimmer. Green competed in two events at the 1972 Summer Olympics.She represented England in the 200, 400 and 800 metres freestyle events, at the 1974 British Commonwealth Games in Christchurch, New Zealand. She won the ASA National Championship title in 1972 and 1973 over 400 metres freestyle and the 1971, 1972 and 1973 800 metres freestyle title.
